a.title: If you would like to report bullying or any other issue to the Richland School District, please click here to be directed to our anonymous tip-line. You can report via text, web, email, or phone.

p.a: If you would like to report bullying or any other issue to the Richland School District, please click here to be directed to our anonymous tip-line. You can report via text, web, email, or phone.
Click/Tap on "Online Payment" icon to access the online payment system."

p.a: Learn more about the Richland School District's commitment to keep our websites accessible for all users.
At the Richland Online Academy (ROA) we strive to offer 21st century learning experiences to empower all learners to succeed in this ever challenging world.
Welcome to Richland School District from Jarred Burke, Richland School District Administrator!

The Richland School District is dedicated to preparing our students for the next steps in their lives - whether that be a degree from a technical college/university or entering the workplace immediately after graduation.
Interested in renting one of our District facilities for your group or organization use? Click here for the information you need.
The Richland School District invites you and your children to join us! The Wisconsin open enrollment program is now open for the 2020-21 school year and the Richland School welcomes you to join us.

div.div: The Richland School District is excited to announce a new option for parents/guardians to pay for food service accounts, athletic fees, and much more.
